list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a point at which lines or pathways intersect or branch; a central or connecting point.
the part of a plant stem from which one or more leaves emerge, often forming a slight swelling or knob.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the stem is cut midway between nodes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: thân cây được cắt giữa các nút

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a lymph node or other structure consisting of a small mass of differentiated tissue.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: infection in these nodes may lead to backache
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiễm trùng trong các nút này có thể dẫn đến đau lưng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a point at which the amplitude of vibration in a standing wave system is zero.
